SmartServe AI - Environment Configuration Template
==================================================

Copy the values below and create a .env file in the root directory.

# Application Settings
NODE_ENV=production
PORT=3000
VITE_APP_TITLE=SmartServe AI
VITE_APP_ID=your_manus_app_id_here

# Database Configuration
DATABASE_URL=mysql://username:password@localhost:3306/smartserve_ai

# Authentication & Security
JWT_SECRET=your_jwt_secret_key_here_min_32_chars
OAUTH_SERVER_URL=https://api.manus.im
VITE_OAUTH_PORTAL_URL=https://portal.manus.im

# Owner Information
OWNER_NAME=Your Name
OWNER_OPEN_ID=your_open_id

# Stripe Payment Configuration
STRIPE_SECRET_KEY=sk_live_your_stripe_secret_key
VITE_STRIPE_PUBLISHABLE_KEY=pk_live_your_stripe_public_key
STRIPE_WEBHOOK_SECRET=whsec_your_webhook_secret

# AI & LLM Configuration
BUILT_IN_FORGE_API_URL=https://api.manus.im
BUILT_IN_FORGE_API_KEY=your_forge_api_key
VITE_FRONTEND_FORGE_API_URL=https://api.manus.im
VITE_FRONTEND_FORGE_API_KEY=your_frontend_forge_api_key

# Analytics Configuration
VITE_ANALYTICS_ENDPOINT=https://analytics.manus.im
VITE_ANALYTICS_WEBSITE_ID=your_website_id

# Branding
VITE_APP_LOGO=/logo.svg

INSTRUCTIONS:
=============
1. Replace all "your_*" values with actual credentials
2. For database, ensure MySQL is running and database exists
3. For Stripe, use test keys for development, live keys for production
4. Keep this file secure and never commit to version control
5. Set appropriate file permissions: chmod 600 .env
